title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.12 - Agency reconciliation of claims to payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.12 - Agency reconciliation of claims to payments

State Regulations

If the amount of any claim is reduced, or the claim is
rejected in the Comptroller's audit, the certifying agency must notify the
claimant. Subsequent to payment, the Statewide Financial System will provide
each agency with a record of payments made on behalf of the agency. Agencies
should use these records as a basis for posting and reconciliation to
expenditure records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
6.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
